attributes.action: Create a special unit in the Metropolitan police that focuses on knife crime.
attributes.additional_details: Knife crime has gotten out of hand in London and it is taking more and more lives. Something should be done before there is no going back.
attributes.background: The Government should create a special forces unit in the Metropolitan police that tackles knife crime.

rejection.details:
The police are operationally independent of the UK Government and Parliament, and it would be their decision to implement a special unit for knife crime. However we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Launch a national public awareness campaign about knife crime
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608683

Minimum sentences and mandatory licensing for carrying a knife
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602388
